title: Council Regulation (EC) No 532/94 of 7 March 1994 extending the measures taken under the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the United States of America for the conclusion of negotiations under GATT Article XXIV.6
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 532/94 of 7 March 1994 extending the measures taken under the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the United States of America for the conclusion of negotiations under GATT Article XXIV.6
THE  COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The measures referred to in the Exchange of Letters complementing the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the United States of America for the conclusion of negotiations under GATT Article XXIV.6 shall be applied by the  Community until 31 December 1994.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following that of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 January 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 March 1994.
For the Council
The President
Th. PANGALOS
(1) OJ No L 98, 10. 4. 1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 17, 23. 1. 1991, p. 17.
(3) OJ No L 372, 31. 12. 1991, p. 35.
(4) OJ No L 104, 29. 4. 1993, p. 1.
